page.title: 16St Minver Over Sixties Club
page.content: The{Over Sixties Club}was founded in {1961}by the present leader of the club. Weekly meetings are held every Tuesday at the{Perceval Institute,}St Minver except the last Tuesday in the month when a trip is organized. There is no membership fee but members pay 10p every week which includes tea and biscuits. At the meetings they have a {keep fit lesson}for 20 minutes and they also play Scrabble and discuss things. The number of people in the club varies every week for obvious reasons. The Over Sixties raise money by jumble sales,mini markets,sales of produce and a handicraft sale.Their fixed winter activities include: a pantomime,a Christmas dinner and a birthday party at the St Moritz Hotel, Trebetherick not to mention the annual concert by the{local primary school choir.
